# Learning outcomes

After this session, you should have solidified your understanding of

::: incremental
- how to conduct an **internal analysis** to identify core competencies from a firm's resources and capabilities;
- how **external factors** affect the company, and how industry structure affects competitive rivalry as well as the implications for strategy formation;
- how changes in external environment shape the **competition dynamics** a company faces; and
- the opportunities and challenges associated with **global expansion**.
:::

# Group work {.vertical-center background-color="#0333ff"}

:::html-hidden
- Form small groups to work on the following assignments.
- After each assignment, we discuss the findings in the plenum. 
- Be prepared to present your insights.
:::

## Internal audit

:::medium
Apply the resource-based view to identify the bundle of critical resources (tangible and intangible) and capabilities that Sea Limited relies on.
:::

:::smaller
Take 15 minutes to work on this task.
:::

## External audit

:::medium
Identify macro-environmental factors that impacted and might impact the profitability of Sea Limited. 
:::

Use following categories: political/legal, economic/ecological, and sociocultural/technological

:::smaller
Take 15 minutes to work on this task.
:::


## Core competences

Core competencies are unique strengths that allow the company to differentiate its products and services from competitors. 

. . .

:::medium
Identify Sea Limited's core competencies.
:::

:::incremental
- Examine the **resources and capabilities**, **macro-environmental factors**, and the dynamics of **their interplay**.
- Apply the **VRIO framework** to analyze whether these factors can deliver a sustained competitive advantage.
:::

:::fragment
:::smaller
Take 15 minutes to work on this task.
:::
:::

## Strategic options

Sea Limited is under pressure from shareholders to generate profit and deliver growth.

:::fragment

:::medium
Use the SWOT framework to develop strategic options for Sea Limited.
:::

:::smaller
Take 20 minutes to work on this task.
:::

:::
